
{{alias}}( v )
    Returns a pseudorandom number drawn from a Student's t distribution.

    If `v <= 0` or `v` is `NaN`, the function
    returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    v: number
        Degrees of freedom.

    Returns
    -------
    r: number
        Pseudorandom number.

    Examples
    --------
    > var r = {{alias}}( 2.0 );


{{alias}}.factory( [v, ][options] )
    Returns a pseudorandom number generator (PRNG) for generating pseudorandom
    numbers drawn from a Student's t distribution.

    If provided `v`, the returned PRNG returns random variates drawn from the
    specified distribution.

    If not provided `v`, the returned PRNG requires that `v` be provided at each
    invocation.

    Parameters
    ----------
    v: number (optional)
        Degrees of freedom.

    options: Object (optional)
        Options.

    options.seed: any (optional)
        Pseudorandom number generator seed.

    Returns
    -------
    rand: Function
        Pseudorandom number generator (PRNG).

    Examples
    --------
    // Basic usage:
    > var rand = {{alias}}.factory();
    > var r = rand( 5.0 );
    > r = rand( 3.14 );

    // Provide `v`:
    > rand = {{alias}}.factory( 5.0 );
    > r = rand();
    > r = rand();


{{alias}}.NAME
    Generator name.

    Examples
    --------
    > var name = {{alias}}.NAME
    't'


{{alias}}.PRNG
    Underlying pseudorandom number generator.

    Examples
    --------
    > var prng = {{alias}}.PRNG;


{{alias}}.SEED
    Pseudorandom number generator seed.

    Examples
    --------
    > var seed = {{alias}}.SEED;

    See Also
    --------
